title: Sion's health scaling broken
body:
Was just in a game where I, at no point, benefitted from my W passive. It always read zero, and I never gained any HP after killing minions, jungle mobs, or even enemy champions.

Pretty much lost me the game, as I had to build HP just to stay alive.

replies.body: how does it READING 0 indicate that the skill didn't give you any hp?

> how does it READING 0 indicate that the skill didn't give you any hp?

Because it gives HP on every kill, and he has 106 CS?

> > how does it READING 0 indicate that the skill didn't give you any hp?
> 
> Because it gives HP on every kill, and he has 106 CS?

dat reading ability, OP

> how does it READING 0 indicate that the skill didn't give you any hp?

Look at my total health, my level, and my items. I should have over 200 more HP than I do. I sat around farming while watching my HP just to make sure it wasn't a glitch on the tooltip, and can assure you I wasn't getting any bonus health.
I had this issue. It happened to me when I first put a point in W when I was in my passive state (Glory in Death). It's a known issue. :]
If you know how to reproduce it, why is there no message in the game client warning people what not to do?
Because the bug is so heavily situational that simply spreading the word about it makes the threat of it negligent.
And how many Sion players read the forums? And specifically stalk the red tracker for updates on Sion?

> I had this issue. It happened to me when I first put a point in W when I was in my passive state (Glory in Death). It's a known issue. :]

Well, thanks for the response, and I hope its getting worked on. I'm also glad we know how to reproduce and avoid it.

So I can again play Sion without fear. :D
